description: This file defines a React component named ConnectJiraButton, which is a reusable button used to initiate the Jira OAuth login flow by redirecting the user to Jira's authorization URL.

methods.name: ConnectJiraButton
methods.description: A React component that renders a button which, when clicked, calls the backend to get the Jira OAuth login URL and redirects the user to it.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles the click event on the button; fetches the OAuth URL and redirects the browser.
